title:
What information do you have concerning the airport that was located on the site that would become the Lincoln Forest subdivision? It was there along Oleander Drive until the early 1950\'s.



You can find an aerial photo of the site at the following link: ftp://ftp.nhcgov.com/Outbound/Gisdata/orthos/. The panel you will want to access is 1949-8f-03.
text:
Here's a link to the answer to your question.



http://www.myreporter.com/?p=10879



  



Ben Steelman,
